Sales Development Representative

Sales New York, NY Full-time

ABOUT PLACER.AI

Placer.ai is transforming how organizations understand the physical world. Our location analytics platform provides unprecedented visibility into locations, markets, and consumer behavior. Placer empowers thousands of customers—from Fortune 500 companies to local governments and nonprofits—to make smarter, data-driven decisions.

What sets us apart?

  • Innovation & Privacy: We’ve built the most advanced location intelligence platform while maintaining an uncompromising commitment to privacy.
  • Rapid Growth: We reached $100M in annual recurring revenue within 6 years, achieved unicorn status ($1B+ valuation) in 2022, and continue to expand as one of North America’s fastest-growing tech companies.
  • Recognition: Named one of Forbes America’s Best Startup Employers and a Deloitte Technology Fast 500 company.

THE ROLE

We are seeking a Sales Development Representative to join our growing sales team. You’ll be responsible for generating qualified leads, building pipeline, and setting up our Account Executives for success. This is an excellent opportunity to launch or advance your sales career in a high-growth SaaS environment.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Lead Generation: Identify and qualify potential customers through research and outreach
  • Outbound Prospecting: Execute multi-channel outreach campaigns via email, phone, and social media
  • Lead Qualification: Conduct discovery calls to understand prospect needs and qualify opportunities
  • Pipeline Building: Generate qualified meetings and opportunities for Account Executives
  • CRM Management: Maintain accurate records and activity tracking in Salesforce
  • Market Research: Research target accounts and identify key decision makers
  • Collaboration: Work closely with marketing and sales teams to optimize lead conversion

REQUIREMENTS

Education: Bachelor’s degree preferred, but not required with relevant experience

Experience:

  • 1-3 years of sales, business development, or customer-facing experience
  • Experience with B2B sales or lead generation preferred
  • Background in SaaS or technology companies is a plus

Sales Skills:

  • Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication abilities
  • Prospecting: Strong research and lead generation capabilities
  • Phone Skills: Comfortable making high-volume outbound calls
  • Email Writing: Ability to craft compelling outreach messages

Technical Skills:

  • CRM: Experience with Salesforce or similar CRM platforms
  • Sales Tools: Familiarity with sales engagement platforms (Outreach, SalesLoft, etc.)
  • Research Tools: Experience with LinkedIn Sales Navigator, ZoomInfo, or similar tools
  • Basic Tech: Comfortable learning and using various sales and marketing technologies

Soft Skills:

  • Resilient and persistent with positive attitude
  • Goal-oriented with strong work ethic
  • Coachable and eager to learn
  • Team player with collaborative mindset

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

  • Experience in data analytics, retail, or real estate industries
  • Background in high-growth startup environments
  • Knowledge of location intelligence or business intelligence concepts
  • Experience with marketing automation platforms
  • Bilingual capabilities (Spanish, French, etc.)

COMPENSATION & BENEFITS

  • Base Salary: Competitive base salary with performance bonuses
  • Commission: Quarterly bonuses based on meeting and exceeding targets
  • Career Path: Clear progression path to Account Executive role
  • Equity: Equity participation in a unicorn company
  • Benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, vision, and 401k benefits

WHY JOIN PLACER.AI?

  • Career Launch: Perfect role to start or advance your sales career
  • Growth Environment: Learn from experienced sales professionals in a scaling organization
  • Product Training: Become an expert in cutting-edge location intelligence technology
  • Advancement Opportunity: Clear path to promotion within 12-18 months
  • Company Culture: Join a collaborative, high-energy team environment

NOTEWORTHY LINKS

  • Placer.ai’s $100M Round C Funding
  • The Anchor (Data in Action)
  • Placer.ai in the News
  • Video: Placer for Commercial Real Estate

Equal Opportunity Employer: Placer.ai is an equal opportunity employer with a global remote workforce. We are committed to a drug-free workplace and providing reasonable accommodations for applicants with disabilities.
